Package tw.jruletest.variables

Class VariableStore

  • java.lang.Object
    • tw.jruletest.variables.VariableStore
  • public class VariableStore
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class designed to store all the variables that exist when the current test suite is being created.

      VariableStore()

    • Method Detail

      • addVariable

        public static void addVariable​(java.lang.String method,
                               java.lang.String varName,
                               java.lang.reflect.Type varType,
                               boolean declared)
        Adds a new variable to the map of variables, using the method name as the key and a new Variable object as the value
        Parameters:
        method - the name of the method which created the variable
        varName - the name of the variable
        varType - the type of the new variable
        declared - boolean flag for if the variable has been declared yet

      • addVariable

        public static void addVariable​(java.lang.String method,
                               java.lang.String varName,
                               java.lang.reflect.Type varType)
        Adds a new variable to the map of variables, using the method name as the key and a new Variable object as the value. The variable created is stored as already declared by default
        Parameters:
        method - the name of the method which created the variable
        varName - the name of the variable
        varType - the type of the new variable

      • getNextUnusedVariableName

        public static java.lang.String getNextUnusedVariableName​(java.lang.String method,
                                                         java.lang.String variableName,
                                                         java.lang.reflect.Type type)
        Uses the provided variable name to create a new variable with a name nearly similar to the current variable. The Variable object created is assumed to be declared.
        Parameters:
        method - the name of the method which created the current variable
        variableName - the name of the current variable
        type - the type of the current variable
        Returns:
        the new name for the variable

      • getVarNames

        public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getVarNames​(java.lang.String method)
        Finds the names of all the variables defined in the required method.
        Parameters:
        method - the name of the method to find the variables for
        Returns:
        a list of the names of all the variables defined in the method

      • findVariable

        public static Variable findVariable​(java.lang.String method,
                                    java.lang.String variableName)
        Finds the Variable object representing the provided method's variable identified by the given variable name.
        Parameters:
        method - the name of the method in which the variable was defined.
        variableName - the name of the variable to find
        Returns:
        the Variable object for the variable found with the given name. Returns null if no variable matches.

      • variableExists

        public static boolean variableExists​(java.lang.String method,
                                     java.lang.String variableName)
        Determines if there exists a variable with the given name in the specified method.
        Parameters:
        method - the name of the method
        variableName - the name of the variable to check existence of
        Returns:
        true if a variable with this name exists in the given method or false if not.

      • reset

        public static void reset()
        Resets the storage for the variables
